JobFullDesc: Marketing Project Lead Specialist-Deloitte's Green Dot Agency Are you a marketing and communications professional who has demonstrated experience in designing, producing, and executing client-focused marketing programs and are looking to take your skills to the next level? Do you thrive in a fast-paced environment, working with colleagues in a virtual setting, to meet our business and client needs?The Marketing Project Lead Specialist operates in Deloitte's internal marketing agency, overseeing all workflow for business-aligned campaigns and projects in a timely and effective manner.The TeamDeloitte's marketing and communications team combines the power of Deloitte's brand with the most inspired marketing techniques to produce business results for our clients.
